basePrompt: Professional modern tech illustration with clean lines, minimalist design, and a cohesive visual language. Use a refined color palette featuring deep blues, vibrant purples, and warm accent colors. Incorporate subtle gradients and geometric patterns that suggest innovation and AI technology. Style should be suitable for technical documentation, marketing materials, and brand presentations. Emphasize clarity, professionalism, and forward-thinking aesthetics.
customPrompt: Use contrasting colors to distinguish between read-only (blue) and edit (green) modes.
userPrompt: Professional modern tech illustration with clean lines, minimalist design, and a cohesive visual language. Use a refined color palette featuring deep blues, vibrant purples, and warm accent colors. Incorporate subtle gradients and geometric patterns that suggest innovation and AI technology. Style should be suitable for technical documentation, marketing materials, and brand presentations. Emphasize clarity, professionalism, and forward-thinking aesthetics.. Highlight code creation with syntax elements, algorithms visualization, and AI-assisted development. Include screens, code blocks, and intelligent automation imagery.. Use contrasting colors to distinguish between read-only (blue) and edit (green) modes.. A split-screen illustration showing the dual-mode conversation system. Left side: Read-only mode with a magnifying glass analyzing code, file icons with 'read' indicators, and a shield symbolizing safety. Right side: Edit mode with a gear/wrench icon, code being modified, and files with 'write' indicators. Use a clear visual divider between the two modes.
